article_title: Tri-Area Community Health to construct center in Ferrum
article_text:
Rocky Mount, VA (24151)

Today

Sunshine and clouds mixed. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High near 90F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 62F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , ferrum college, health center, pharmacy, tri-, health, need

og.description: Tri-Area Community Health at Ferrum was awarded $1 million by Health and Human Services (HHS) to be used toward construction of a comprehensive health center and pharmacy in Ferrum.
